thread.title: NBC takes British Open from ESPN
thread.title_full: NBC takes British Open from ESPN - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Alexander Soule
title: NBC takes British Open from ESPN
text:
Photo: Michael Macor / The Chronicle NBC Sports will begin covering the British Open in 2016, a year earlier than planned. NBC Sports will begin covering the British Open in 2016, a year...
NBC Sports Group will begin covering the British Open a year earlier than planned, with the golf tournament long televised by ESPN. NBC Sports will begin covering the British Open in 2016, a year earlier than planned. NBC Sports will begin covering the British Open in 2016, a year...
NBC Sports Group will begin covering the British Open a year earlier than planned, with the golf tournament long televised by ESPN.
